message: Hey! Are you the new worker?

replies.text: Insolence! Who do you think you are?

message: It took you long to get here! I hope you are not always that slow.
I need someone to check if all the items are still in the storage.
I always buy a pair of any item. So it would be best if you find the pairs.
Each time you find a pair, take it out of the storage bin!
Come back to me when you found all the pairs and tell me how many there are.

replies.text: OK. I'll be back in a minute.
Eh, what do you want me to do exactly?

message: OK: Go to the storage and take out an item.
Then go and look for the another item of the same kind. So then you'll have a pair of them.
After that take another item, and look for the second one to get a pair again.
Do this for all pairs, until you have found every one.

If you have one item in hand, and in the next there is an item that doesn't match, then both items automatically go back to their bin.
So be sure to take the items in pairs.
Understood? Repeat it to me!

replies.text: I shall get the items, one by one.
Not necessary. I'll be back in a minute.

message: And?

replies.text: I shall find them in the right order: Pair after pair.

message: OK. Hurry now.
How do you get on with the work?

replies.text: I'm not quite done yet. I just want to take a short break.
Please tell me again, what I should do.
I found 10 pairs of each item.

message: I'm not paying you to laze around! Back to work!
10 pairs! Great - but where are they? I don't see them.

replies.text: Oh, I must have lost some. Wait a second...

message: 10 pairs - that is correct. So everything is in order.
Good work! I am very pleased with you.

replies.text: I am glad. How much do I actually get for this work?

message: Good work gives good wages! Here is 100 gold.
What?
Ah! You have finally return, my new worker.

replies.text: How may I be of service?

message: I need someone to deliver all of the items that are on a storage.
Come back to me when you deliver all of the items in any order. Here is the list of customers.

replies.text: You want me to deliver these items to your customers?

message: Yes yes, hurry now. I have work to do here.

replies.text: Hope I get paid better this time.

message: Hello. I'm Arcir.

replies.text: I noticed your statue of Elythara downstairs.
You really seem to like your books.
Hello, did you order 'Dusty old book'?

message: Yes, an old but useful book but you should wipe it first. Anyway, here's my delivery fee.
I'm Edrin, the Brimhaven metalsmith.

replies.text: What does a metalsmith do? Is that the same as a blacksmith?
I don't think that's what I'm looking for. Thanks anyway.
Please show me what you have to trade.

message: Yes, a stripy striped hammer. Anyway, here's my delivery fee.
Welcome to my shop. Are you looking for anything in particular?

replies.text: Please show me everything you have available.
I am looking for my brother, Andor. Have you seen anyone recently that looks a bit like me?
Can you tell me anything about Stoutford?
Hello, did you order 'Pretty Porcelain Figure'?

message: Yes, indeed. A gift for my beautiful daughter...but why it took so long? Sigh, here's my delivery fee.
Hello, what can I do for you?

replies.text: I want to buy the dresses.
I want you to improve some of my clothes.
I am looking for my brother, Andor. He looks a bit like me.
Have you ever seen a glove like this? [Shows Venanra the glove.]
Hello, did you order 'Old, worn cape'?

message: Yes I did, kid. Old but still beneficial. Here's my delivery fee.
Oh, what a rare surprise!

replies.text: What are you doing in such a lonely place?
Hello, did you order 'Mysterious green something'?

message: *Sigh* You were my last hope. Leave me now.

replies.text: Hello, did you order 'Mysterious green something'?

message: Thank you for your help.

replies.text: Hello, did you order 'Mysterious green something'?

message: Oh, you look better than the last time we met. Thank you for your help.

replies.text: Hello, did you order 'Mysterious green something'?

message: What?! My lucky clover...but why now? Anyway, I'll no longer ran out of luck this time. Here's my delivery fee.
What are you doing in my lords rooms?

replies.text: You are lying around in bed in broad daylight?

message: Finally, I'm no longer afraid of that room every time my lord turns off the lights to scare me. Here's my delivery fee.
How interesting. The child from Fallhaven, here in Remgard?

replies.text: I'm not from Fallhaven, I am from Crossglen, west of Fallhaven.
How do you know where I am from?

message: Yes, kid. I use this to pair with a best seller unique boot - the Bar Brawler's boots. It is very helpful for you, kid.
Welcome back. Have you found out anything about my son, Rincel?

replies.text: Can you tell me the story about what happened again?
No, I have not found anything yet.
Yes, I have found out the story about what happened to him.

message: Welcome back. Thank you for your help in finding out what happened to my son.
Shadow help me.
My son! My son is gone.

replies.text: Jolnor said I should see you about your son.

message: I don't want to talk about it. Not with an outsider like you.

replies.text: Jolnor said I should see you about your son.

message: That's not what I'm waiting for! Go out and find out what happened to my son, please!
Yes, I'm longing for it just like how I'm longing for my son. But now I can mourn as I play his favorite song until I die.

replies.text: My sincere condolence for the lose of your beloved son.

message: Anything else I can help you with?

replies.text: Do you have any more tasks for me?
Do you have any more tasks for me?
Do you have any more tasks for me?
Do you have any tasks for me?
Is there anything else you can tell me about Andor?
I have a present for you.
I have a present for you.
What kind of book is it that you have in your hand?

message: Oh wow! Finally, your brother's gift has arrived and we only have to wait for his arrival.
I already gave you his shield.
Anyway, it's been a very long time so please go look for your brother.
What has brought you to me? It looks like you might need my help.
Anything more I can help you with?

replies.text: Please tell me something that you can see about me or my brother Andor. [Give him 100 gold]
I don't have 100 gold to pay you.

message: Ah yes, I need new one. Say you want me to help you?

replies.text: I'm on a hurry. Thanks, anyway.

message: You are back. Did you deliver all of the items?
Then what are you standing there for?! Get out and deliver everything!
Good. Please give me back my Docket.
You irresponsible kid! Get out, find it and bring it to me!
Good job! I am glad that you work responsibly.

rewards.message: That is serious. Here is 100 gold.
I have no work for you at the moment.
